title: User Settings
subtitle: Note: updating your initial bankroll will affect your current bankroll the next time you update a saved bet statatus.
roundUpDescription: Betting in even amounts can contribute to a smoother betting experience and reduce the likelihood of your bets being flagged as potential arbitrage or suspicious patterns.
useDynamicBankrollDes: Your current bankroll is calculated by factoring in your initial bankroll and the net payouts from your completed bets. Your current bankroll:
